Text.Language: }metsamse i~dwlon qen oujwk fojc e~bolqen pikocmoc.
The worship of idols, utterly uproot from the world.
عبادةُ الأوثانِ بالتمام، اقلعها من العالمِ.
Pcatanac nem jom niben ethwou n~taf qemqwmou ouoh mayebiw~ou: capec/t n~nen[alauj n~,wlem.
Satan and all his evil powers, trample and humiliate them under our feet speedily.
الشيطانُ وكلَّ قواتِه الشريرةِ، اسحقهم وأذِلَّهُم تحت أقدامِنا سريعاً.
Nic~kandalon nem n/eti~ri m~mwou korfou: marouk/n n~je nivwrj m~p~tako n~te niherecic.
The offences and their instigators, abolish. Let the dissensions of corrupt heresies cease.
الشكوكُ وفاعلوها أبطِلهُم، ولتنقضِ إفتراقاتُ فسادِ البدعِ.
Nijaji n~te tekekk~l/cia eyouab P[oic: m~v~r/] n~c/ou niben nem ]nou mayebiw~ou.
The enemies of Your holy Church, O Lord, as at all times, now also humiliate.
أعداءُ كنيستِكَ المقدسةِ ياربُّ، مثلَ كلِّ زمانٍ والآنَ، أَذِلَّهُم.
Bwl n~toumet[acih/t e~bol: matamwou e~toumetjwb n~,wlem.
Strip their vanity, show them their weakness speedily.
Kwrf n~nouv~yonoc noue~piboul/ noumankania noukakourgia noukatalalia e~toui~ri m~mwou qaron.
Bring to naught their envies, their intrigues, their madness, their wickedness, and their slanders, which they commit against us.
أبطِل حسَدَهم وسعايتَهم وجنونَهم وشرَّهم ونميمتَهم التي يصنعونَها فينا.
